original_title: 映像作品集6巻~Tour 2009 ワールド ワールド ワールド~
overview: The live performance at Kamakura Arts Center, the final stop of ASIAN KUNG-FU GENERATION's first hall tour "Tour 2009 World World World", which was a great success in March this year, is now available on DVD! The DVD features the introduction of the electronic instrument TENORI-ON, an arrangement with strings, and an acoustic part, which is different from the live performances at live houses and arenas, and full of ideas. The concert will also feature all the songs from the second full-length album "Surf Bungaku Kamakura" released last November in 2008, in the same order as they appeared on the album!
title: Eizo Sakuhin Volume 6 ~Tour 2009 World World World~
